name: TrueMotion VP7 Video File
summary: Learn about .VP7 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open and view .VP7 files with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Media Player Classic with K-Lite Mega Codec Pack
Microsoft Windows Media Player with Storm Codec

content: VP7 video encoding is used for Video-on-Demand, HD video, and mobile video applications. Some examples include AOL Instant Messenger, Skype 2, Triton, Move Networks, and Viewpoint Media Player.

description: Encoded video format developed by On2 Technologies; designed to encode video quickly and decode video in fewer cycles than other compression schemes; optimized for playback on low-power devices and includes advanced buffering and latency features.
